text: The Height (Russian: Высота, Translit.: Vysota) is a 1957 Russian drama movie directed by Aleksandr Zarkhi and was based on the novel of the same name by Evgeny Vorobyov. It stars Inna Makarova, Nikolai Rybnikov, Lev Borisov and was distributed by Mosfilm. The plot is based on a team of steel erectors working on a construction site in a small town. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Zarkhi
title: The Height
